about_the_game:
Grukhthani pulls you into a dark village hidden in thick fog, a place where hope seems lost. After a terrible bus accident, Abhudhay accidentally ends up in this eerie land. As he wanders the empty streets of Grukhthani, he faces the fears and sorrows of its strange inhabitants.

Key Features: Explore a Haunting World: Walk through foggy alleys and abandoned Houses filled with secrets.

Discover a Dark Story: Learn about the villagers and their tragic lives as Abhudhay tries to understand what happened to them.

Solve Challenging Puzzles: Tackle puzzles that reveal the village's dark past. Atmospheric

Sound Design: Experience a chilling soundtrack that enhances the eerie feeling of the game.

Will Abhudhay find a way out of this unforgiving village, or will he become part of its darkness?

name: Grukhthani

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 | AMD Ryzen 3 3200g
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 ti or AMD Radeon™ RX550
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device.
  • Additional Notes: Playing on minimum requirements should enable to play on Low/Medium quality settings in FullHD (1080p) in stable 30 FPS.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K | AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1070 Ti or AMD Radeon™ RX 5700 or Intel® Arc™ A750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device.
  • Additional Notes: Playing on recommended requirements should enable to play on Medium quality settings in 60 FPS or High quality settings in 30 FPS, in FullHD (or 4k using DLSS or similar technology).

short_description: Grukhthani , a place shrouded in mystery and buried secrets. As you explore its eerie, abandoned streets and uncover chilling clues, you'll confront terrifying visions that blur the line between reality and nightmare. The fog hides more than just the past—it conceals your greatest fears.
